thread.title: Favorite W -
thread.title_full: Favorite W - Review of W New York - Union Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Dillon J
title: Favorite W -
text: I love W Hotels and this is my favorite one I've been in so far. The decor of the old style building is lovely and I really enjoyed the common spaces and lobbies on each floor. The Wholefoods across the street is very convenient for food and items you may need. The staff was prompt and great. What I expect from W and Starwood.
